title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka OVA (Dub)
alternative_title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?: Is It Wrong to Expect a Hot Spring in a Dungeon?, ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうか OVA「ダンジョンに温泉を求めるのは 間違っているだろうか, DanMachi OVA
description: On their way back from the 18th floor, Hestia, Bell, and the others accidentally uncover a hidden, mystical hot spring, and they decide to stop by to refresh themselves until creatures lurking in the dark appear to attack them.
